description: Show how you really feel. Make someone beautiful. Make something illegal
install_msg: This cog contains a data folder with a single font and files to create your own `isnowillegal` image. This cog may cause issues with the bot restarting, in your console try `apt install python3-opencv` to install opencv-python instead. Type `[p]help ImageMaker` to see available commands.
name: Imagemaker
